business.headline: Explained: Why Warren Buffett warned that US Dollar could be 'going to hell'The remarks reflected deeper concerns Buffett has long harboured: America's swelling deficit, a growing culture of bureaucratic inefficiency, and the rising use of trade policy as a political weapon.

Who is Greg Abel, Warren Buffett's heir to Berkshire's $1.18 trillion empire?Greg Abel, who has served as vice chairman overseeing Berkshire's sprawling non-insurance operations, has been a trusted Warren Buffett lieutenant for over a decade.

Warren Buffett bows out with stark dollar warning: Currency going to hellWarren Buffett, who officially handed over the CEO reins to Vice Chairman Greg Abel at the meeting, indicated that a significant investment in a European country could prompt Berkshire to conduct more financing in foreign currencies.

Warren Buffett to step down as Berkshire CEO, Greg Abel to take overWarren Buffett, 94, said that he will step down as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway at the end of 2025 and hand over the reins to Vice Chairman Greg Abel.

India bans all imports from Pakistan in response to Pahalgam terror attackIn a strong response to the Pahalgam terror attack, India has banned both direct and indirect imports from Pakistan and denied Pakistani ships access to Indian ports. Although direct imports were minimal, some goods were entering through third-party countries.

India bans imports from Pak, bars port access in tough moves post PahalgamThe move comes after India announced the closure of the Attari-Wagah land border following the Pahalgam attack, crippling bilateral trade.
Mutual funds are on the rise again. Check out these 5 bets in 2025Choosing the right mutual fund depends on how much risk you're comfortable with and how long you plan to invest.

Oyo delays IPO attempt for 3rd time as largest shareholder opposes: ReportIndia's Nifty 50 index has risen about 3% in 2025 so far, but it's still over 7% below its all-time high from October last year. This market volatility has affected several companies.

UPI witnesses small dip in April, but yearly growth remains strongAccording to data from the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI), UPI processed 17.89 billion transactions in April, which is about 2.2% less than March's 18.30 billion.

Adani's nephew accused of insider trading by Sebi, seeks settlement: ReportThe scrutiny is the latest challenge for the Adani group. US authorities last year indicted Gautam Adani and two Adani Green executives for allegedly paying bribes to secure Indian power supply contracts and misleading US investors. The group has denied the charges and called them "baseless".
Sensex ends 260 points higher, Nifty above 24,300; Adani Ports gains 4%The S&P BSE Sensex rose 259.75 points to close at 80,501.99, while the NSE Nifty50 ended just 12.50 points higher at 24,346.70.
Zoho halts $700 million chip manufacturing plan. Here's whyZoho, started in 1996, is known for offering affordable business software and services to companies around the world.

entertainment.headline: Aamir Khan-Gauri Spratt visit Boney Kapoor, offer condolences after mother's deathAamir Khan and his girlfriend Gauri Spratt recently visited Boney Kapoor to offer their condolences following the funeral of his mother, Nirmal Kapoor. The couple was seen at Boney Kapoor's residence, expressing their support during this difficult time.

Diljit Dosanjh confirms his MET Gala debut, says 'first time' in new postIt is official! Singer and actor Diljit Dosanjh is all set to make his debut at MET Gala 2025. He would be joined by Shah Rukh Khan, Kiara Advani and Priyanka Chopra.

SRK arrives in New York for MET Gala debut, greets fans at airportShah Rukh Khan has finally reached New York for his much-anticipated MET Gala debut this year. A video from his arrival at the airport is going viral, of him greeting fans.

Baazi: Where noir meets nonsense in Dev Anand and Guru Dutt's early experimentBaazi, a 1951 Bollywood film directed by Guru Dutt, showcases Dev Anand's charm. Despite its absurd ending, it remains a box-office classic with a unique cinematic style.

Ram Charan cheers for 'dear brother' Nani after HIT 3's successTollywood star Ram Charan is the latest to join the chorus of praise for Nani's latest film, 'HIT: The Third Case'. On Saturday, he shared a note congratulating the cast and crew of the Telugu action-thriller.

Thalaivan Thalaivii: Vijay Sethupathi and Nithya Menen's film gets a titleActors Vijay Sethupathi and Nithya Menen's upcoming movie has been titled 'Thalaivan Thalaivii'. The title teaser was shared on May 3.

Mira Rajput felt 'isolated' marrying Shahid Kapoor at 20: Was occupied, caught upMira Rajput recently opened up about marrying Shahid Kapoor at the age of 20. She admitted to feeling isolated at times and confessed that she longed for the kind of life her friends were living during that phase.

Kapil Sharma flaunts stunning transformation in new video, celebs and fans reactKapil Sharma has been impressing fans with his remarkable weight-loss transformation. On Saturday, the comedian shared a video of himself running through the hills, drawing reactions from both celebrities and fans alike.

Panchayat 4 teaser: It's Pradhan Ji vs Bhushan in high-stakes Phulera electionThe teaser of the much-awaited season four of Prime Video's 'Panchayat' is out. The upcoming season will premiere in July.

Kim Soo-hyun's agency files fresh complaint against YouTuber Kim Se-euiKorean actor Kim Soo-hyun's agency has filed a fresh complaint against YouTuber Kim Se-eui for spreading false information about the actor. The agency issued a statement and detailed the complaint.

Marvels reunion: Robert Downey, Chris Hemsworth, Paul Rudd at Thunderbolts screeningAvengers assembled once again for the star-studded premiere of Thunderbolts. The event witnessed the reunion of Robert Downey Jr, Paul Rudd, Chris Hemsworth, Simu Liu and others.

Priyanka Chopra is eager to reunite with her 'angels' Nick Jonas, Malti. See picPriyanka Chopra recently expressed her excitement about reuniting with husband Nick Jonas and daughter Malti Marie. The actor shared a picture on social media that is sure to melt your heart.

Good Bad Ugly OTT release: When, where to watch Ajith's action comedyAfter doing decent business at the box office, Ajith Kumar's latest release Good Bad Ugly is set for its OTT debut. An action-comedy, the film is directed by Adhik Ravichandran and will premiere on Netflix.

HIT 3 vs Retro box office Day 2: Nani's film outshines Suriya's thrillerIt has been a roaring start to the South films HIT 3 and Retro. However, by Day 2, Nani's cop-thriller overpowered Suriya's Tamil thriller at the domestic box office.

Vijay Deverakonda clarifies 'tribal clashes' remark on Pahalgam attackActor Vijay Deverakonda issued a statement and clarified his recent remarks on the tribal community. The actor stated that he did not intend to hurt the sentiments of anyone.

Pakistani singer Abida Parveen's Instagram account blocked in IndiaVeteran Pakistani singer Abida Parveen's Instagram account has been blocked in India. This comes in the wake of the terror attack in Jammu and Kashmir on April 22.

Why audiences can't get enough of heist thrillersHeist thrillers have captivated Indian audiences with their blend of drama, suspense, and moral complexity. From iconic films like Special 26 to the recent Jewel Thief, these stories offer a thrilling escape, inviting viewers to root for charismatic anti-heroes. In this week's Cinematic Saturday, we explore why audiences, actors and filmmakers love the genre.

Hanumankind confirms his track in Thalapathy Vijay's final film Jana NayaganRapper Hanumankind confirmed teaming up with composer Anirudh Ravichander for Thalapaty Vijay's upcoming film, 'Jana Nayagan'.

Raid 2 box office: Ajay Devgn's thriller crosses Rs 30 crore in two daysAjay Devgn's 'Raid 2' has kicked off strongly at the box office, raking in over Rs 31 crore in its first two days. Directed by Raj Kumar Gupta, the film released in theatres on May 1.

general news.headline: Will use full spectrum of power: Pak envoy's nuke threat to India amid tensionsPakistan's Ambassador to Russia Muhammad Khalid Jamali has threatened that his country will use nuclear weapons on India if New Delhi launches a military action on the neighbouring country.

Married Pak woman after getting nod from CRPF headquarters: Dismissed jawanA Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) jawan, who was dismissed from service for allegedly concealing his marriage to a Pakistani woman, said he got married to her only after receiving prior approval from CRPF headquarters.

Warren Buffett bows out with stark dollar warning: Currency going to hellWarren Buffett, who officially handed over the CEO reins to Vice Chairman Greg Abel at the meeting, indicated that a significant investment in a European country could prompt Berkshire to conduct more financing in foreign currencies.

3-year-old with tumour dies after Jain 'fast unto death' enforced by parentsHer parents, who work as Information Technology (IT) professionals, say that they decided to make their daughter take the Santhara vow after being advised by a Jain muni (monk).

RCB vs CSK reminds MS Dhoni that he is living on borrowed time in IPLThe RCB vs CSK clash once again put up a reminder that MS Dhoni is well past his prime. As cricket fades away from one of the most legendary figures in Indian cricket, it is perhaps time for CSK to fasten the process of much-needed transition in the team.

Actor Sean Penn likens Trump to spouse killer: May destroy world before he goesActor Sean Penn has compared US President Donald Trump to a "jealous spouse who murders another partner" and warned that he may "try to destroy the world" if his third-term ambitions were not fulfilled.

Pakistan soldier detained by border force in Rajasthan: SourcesA Pakistani Ranger was detained by the BSF along the Rajasthan border amid heightened India-Pakistan tensions, days after a BSF jawan was held by Pakistani forces following a cross-border incident.

Medical aspirant dies by suicide in Kota a day before NEET-UG examA medical aspirant, who was to appear for the NEET-UG exam today, was found hanging in her room in Rajasthan's Kota. Police said no suicide note was found and a probe was on to determine the reason for the victim taking the extreme step.

India cuts short Krishnamurthy Subramanian's term at IMF boardIndia has announced the termination of Dr Krishnamurthy Subramanian's services as Executive Director (India) at the International Monetary Fund with six months still left in his three-year term.

Big explosion rocks Elon Musk's Starship testing, launch postponedThe explosion of the SpaceX Starship rocket occurred in Texas during a routine static fire test, a critical step before any launch, where engines are ignited while the rocket remains anchored to the ground.

'No welcome till J&K attack avenged': Union Minister refuses bouquet at eventTwenty-six people, mostly tourists, were killed and several injured in Pahalgam terror attack on April 22. The government has vowed a strong response, with full operational freedom granted to the armed forces to determine the timing and nature of the retaliation.

Video: Ukraine says it shot down Russian fighter jet with sea drone for first timeUkraine said that its seaborne drone shot down the Russian fighter jet Su-30, claiming that it was the world's first downing of a combat plane by a maritime drone.

SRK arrives in New York for MET Gala debut, greets fans at airportShah Rukh Khan has finally reached New York for his much-anticipated MET Gala debut this year. A video from his arrival at the airport is going viral, of him greeting fans.

India conducts maiden flight-trials of stratospheric airship platformIndia successfully conducted the maiden flight-trials of its Stratospheric Airship Platform, developed by the Agra-based Aerial Delivery Research and Development Establishment, on May 3.

Diljit Dosanjh confirms his MET Gala debut, says 'first time' in new postIt is official! Singer and actor Diljit Dosanjh is all set to make his debut at MET Gala 2025. He would be joined by Shah Rukh Khan, Kiara Advani and Priyanka Chopra.
Question Time: Weekly News QuizThink you read the headlines this week? Let's test that!

Before Pahalgam attack, intel warned of possible tourist targeting: OfficialsDays before the deadly April 22 terror attack in Pahalgam, intelligence agencies had flagged the potential targeting of tourists, especially those staying in hotels on the outskirts of Srinagar, officials said.
Man breaks into Seema Haider's house, claims she used black magic on himThe accused, who forcibly entered Seema Haider's house in Greater Noida, alleged that the woman had used black magic on him.

Is your child still walking on toes at 3? It could be autismStudies show that toe walking is seen in 20% to 45% of children with autism, compared to only about 4.5% in children who are typically developing.

Elon Musk's Starbase set to become Texas' newest city after overwhelming voteA vote Saturday to formally organize Starbase as a city was being approved by a lopsided margin by a small group of voters who live there and are mostly Musk's employees at SpaceX.

Pakistan violates border ceasefire for 10th day, Army respondsFiring between the two sides comes amid heightened tensions following the April 22 terror attack in Pahalgam in which 26 people, mostly tourists, were killed.

Virar special Ayush Mhatre: A breath of fresh air for CSK in forgetful campaignIPL 2025, CSK vs RCB: In what has otherwise been a season to forget for Chennai Super Kings, Ayush Mhatre has emerged as a breath of fresh air. With his fearless strokeplay, Mhatre almost pulled off the impossible, smashing a brilliant 94 off 48 balls, which included nine boundaries and five towering sixes vs RCB.

sports.headline: KKR to follow MI roadmap in must-win game vs Rajasthan: Rovman PowellIPL 2025: Struggling KKR will follow Mumbai Indians' strategy against Rajasthan Royals in a crucial IPL match, said Rovman Powell. KKR have to win all their games to make it to the playoffs.

Pratika Rawal's rise and India's bold charge towards Women's World Cup glorySpeaking to India Today Digital, former Indian cricketer and Mumbai Indians batting coach Devika Palshikar opened up on India's experimentation spree before the World Cup, Pratika Rawal's stupendous form and Shafali Verma's future in the ODI setup.

Difficult to sit and watch others win: Shepherd on heroic 53 vs CSKIPL 2025, RCB vs CSK: Romari Shepherd said that it was tough for him to not get enough chances. On Saturday, his unbeaten 53 helped Royal Challengers Bengaluru beat Chennai Super Kings by two runs.

Ayush Mhatre has got everything liked about a modern-day T20 player: FlemingIPL 2025: 17-year-old CSK batter Ayush Mhatre showed his potential after scoring 94 off 48 against the Royal Challengers Bengaluru on Saturday at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium.

Confident youngsters have been key for PBKS in IPL 2025: Brad HaddinPBKS assistant coach Brad Haddin credited the team's young stars for stepping up at the right time, saying their confidence and composure have been key to Punjab's strong push towards the IPL 2025 playoffs.

Diligent Yash Dayal leads RCB's cleansweep of CSK with maximum effortIn a nail-biting finish, Yash Dayal's final over heroics ensured a crucial win for Royal Challengers Bengaluru against Chennai Super Kings. This victory not only solidifies RCB's top position in the IPL standings but also highlights Dayal's remarkable comeback story.

Watch: Dewald Brevis DRS drama costs CSK in IPL thriller vs RCBDewald Brevis's controversial dismissal in the 17th over proved costly for the Chennai Super Kings in their IPL thriller against Royal Challengers Bengaluru at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium.

RCB fans go delirious as Yash Dayal does double over CSK: Absolute cinemaIPL 2025: Fans went delirious as Royal Challengers Bengaluru defeated Chennai Super Kings in yet another IPL classic on Saturday, May 3. The fans praised Yasg Dayal for holding his nerve against CSK for the second time in 2 years.

MS Dhoni blames himself after CSK lose battle of nerves vs RCB in IPL thrillerChennai Super Kings (CSK) captain MS Dhoni took full responsibility after his side suffered a heartbreaking two-run defeat to Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) in a last-over thriller at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium.

IPL 2025: RCB complete first-ever double over CSK to inch closer to playoffsIPL 2025: RCB took a giant leap towards the playoffs, but only after surviving a teenage storm from Ayush Mhatre and reliving another Yash Dayal classic at a nerve-wracked 2 run win over CSK in Chinnaswamy.

CSK's Khaleel Ahmed bowls most expensive spell, leaks 33 in 19th over vs RCBIPL 2025: Khaleel Ahmed endured a nightmare at the Chinnaswamy as Romario Shepherd's assault left him with the most expensive bowling spell in IPL history, conceding 65 runs in just three overs for Chennai Super Kings.

14-ball 53: Romario Shepherd hits second-fastest fifty in IPL historyRoyal Challengers Bengaluru all-rounder Romario Shephard registered the joint-second-fastest fifty in the history of the Indian Premier League. Shephard completed his maiden IPL fifty off just 53 balls against CSK.

Most 50s to 300 sixes for RCB: Virat Kohli breaks multiple IPL recordsVirat Kohli became the first player to hit 300 sixes for Royal Challengers Bengaluru after scoring his record-equalling 62nd IPL fifty in the match against Chennai Super Kings at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium.

After India's withdrawal, Volleyball tournament shifted from Pakistan to UzbekistanThe Central Asian volleyball tournament has been relocated to Tashkent, Uzbekistan, after India's withdrawal following a terror attack in Pahalgam. The event, originally set in Islamabad, will proceed with participating teams from Pakistan, Iran, Turkmenistan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Uzbekistan.

The event, originally set in Islamabad, will proceed with participating teams from Pakistan, Iran, Turkmenistan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Uzbekistan.

Keqiao Diamond League: Avinash Sable finishes 8th in men's 3000m steeple chaseIndia's Avinash Sable secured eighth place in the men's 3000m steeplechase at the ongoing Keqiao Diamond League, clocking a time of 8 minutes and 23.85 seconds.

RCB rest Josh Hazlewood for big CSK clash as Lungi Ngidi makes debutIPL 2025: In a strategic but surprising move, RCB rested star pacer Josh Hazlewood for their crucial clash against CSK, handing Lungi Ngidi his long-awaited debut as Bengaluru look to fine-tune their attack ahead of the IPL 2025 playoffs.

Rabada back in IPL after serving suspension for recreational drug useSouth African pacer Kagiso Rabada's departure from the IPL on April 3 was due to "provisional suspension" after testing positive for a recreational drug.

Vaibhav Suryavanshi has licence to express himself: RR bowling coach Shane BondRajasthan Royals bowling coach Shane Bond revealed that teenage sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi has been granted a rare and precious commodity in elite-level cricket - the freedom to express himself.

FC Goa vs Jamshedpur FC, Kalinga Super Cup Final: Livestreaming, TV channelFC Goa and Jamshedpur FC are set for a blockbuster showdown in the Kalinga Super Cup Final, with a coveted continental spot and silverware on the line in one of Indian football's fiercest emerging rivalries.

Vaibhav Suryavanshi needs to be protected: Greg Chappell warns BCCIIPL 2025: Greg Chappell warned the BCCI not to repeat past mistakes with young stars, urging them to protect 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi from early pressure and hype to help him grow the right way.

Sri Lanka vs India, Tri-series Match 4: When and where to watch?Harmanpreet Kaur's India will look to qualify for the final of the tri-nation series when they meet hosts Sri Lanka on Sunday, May 4 at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.

Pratika Rawal aims Tendulkar's feat as India Women eye tri-series final spotPratika Rawal, who recently became the fastest to 500 runs in Women's ODIs, is on the verge of going past the legendary duo of Rahul Dravid and Sachin Tendulkar in an elite list of batters.

Pep Guardiola clarifies break from football remark: I won't retire from managingPep Guardiola has clarified the break from football remark he made by saying that he won't retire from management after his stint with Manchester City comes to an end.

How Tim David learnt from past mistakes to sparkle for RCBIPL 2025: Tim David said that he's very clear about the role RCB have wanted him to play in the ongoing tournament. In 10 games, David has scored 184 runs at a strike-rate of 197.84.

Can't see Pakistan being part of Asia Cup after Pahalgam attack: Sunil GavaskarSunil Gavaskar feels that Pakistan won't be a part of the upcoming Asia Cup in India and Sri Lanka after the Pahalgam terror attack last month. The Asia Cup is set to take place later this year.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
